English.Text: You strike gold! Metaphorically, at least. "The fourth rain god, yes!" your anthropologist reads from the glyphs, and scampers off yelling, "corresponds with our North!" When the archaeologist wades back through the small lagoon, they have a big smile on their face. It is a hoard of greater archaeological value than any of the materials from which it is composed! This may not be the city of El Doodah, but it is quite remarkable enough!
